website_summaries.verdict: Offers the original features owners love in MyPillows for a bit less than the Premium Series – choose if medium or firm loft works for you.
pros: MyPillow's original pillow that introduced the patented interlocking fill and stay-cool Open Cell Poly material
Available in 2 loft levels: medium and firm
cons: several owners advised removing some of the fill for improved comfort

customer_reviews.title: Lumps, Lumps, Lumps
customer_reviews.text: If you like a lumpy pillow this is the one for you! Tried this pillow only one night and it was the worst pillow I have ever used. I don't get the hype of this pillow! There was no neck support, my head was engulfed on both sides with my neck sinking to the bed. Worse sleep I ever had.
customer_reviews.author: BijinSue

customer_reviews.title: Huge bummer
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions and put this in the dryer before usage. It turned into lumpy cotton balls! You can feel each lump through the lining of the pillow. I was SO excited for this and now I’ll be sending it back. I’ve been hearing about how great these pillows are for a few years and now I think it’s all nonsense. I won’t be recommending them to anyone. I planned on ordering two more (for me parents) and that quickly changed.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Worst Pillow Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst pillows ever! I usually buy cheaper pillows but wanted something better so decided to spend the money and get a My Pillow - What a waste of money! It's a flat bag of chopped up foam. The cheap pillows at TJ Maxx are way better. All the reviews that love this pillow have to be fake - DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eggcrate mattress topper ripped up and stuffed into pillow shell
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is not comfortable. I would not recommend it. It just feels like someone ripped up an old eggcrate mattress topper and stuffed into a pillow shell. I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: RollToTheTide

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Don't like it. Tried it for one night and went back to my memory foam pillow. My home health aide had just raved about it was the reason I bought it. So I gave it to her. Just too soft and not for me.
customer_reviews.author: George E. Creel

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like it, but it made my neck problems and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry-I don't usually leave negative reviews, but this was trash. Definitely not worth almost $50! The foam was all shredded (as described) but it didn't "interlock" together...it all just went around my head and soon my head was laying directly on the mattress with no padding underneath. I really wanted to like it, but it made my neck problems and headaches worse.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Bleiler

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than advertised and simply filled with shredded memory foam.....make them yourself. Overpriced!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not the miracle they claim it to be
customer_reviews.text: They advertise the fact that its "adjustable patented fill holds its shape through the entire night". That's not even close to being true. It lost its shape all night long. My head just caved right into it. I should have known it couldn't be true. If you can you adjust the fill simply by fluffing it and resting your head into it, then how could it stay like that all night long? Also, it's loud; whenever you move your head, you hear a crunching sound. Waste of money. For such an expensive pillow, it's a piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: This is quite possibly the worst pillow on the planet
customer_reviews.text: This is quite possibly the worst pillow on the planet. It is supposedly the best pillow which cures all neck issues while sleeping. I couldn't make it thru half a night and had to throw this horrible lump of foam off the bed and go back to my down pillow. It's just a gimmick, this pillow is awful. $50 for $1 worth of foam in a pillow case. This guy is screwing people and laughing all the way to the bank.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Flat and lumpy
customer_reviews.text: This pillow came rolled up and flat. I can feel chunks of foam stuck together. I tried fluffing it up but it doesn’t really change very much. I’m returning and feel this is a waste of money. I do not recommend anyone buy this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: I gave it two weeks and the stiff neck just got worse. My Pillow just got trashed
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but don't see the attraction. I was getting a stiff neck from sleeping on a standard pillow so decided to try the fabulous My Pillow. I gave it two weeks and the stiff neck just got worse. My Pillow just got trashed.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special. Hype and marketing.
customer_reviews.text: Hype and marketing masterpiece! Well done Mr. USA all the way. I'd be happier going to a discount store and buying a $7 pillow 4 time a year and getting a fresh fluffer. ....this is nothing special. Unless over spending is special to you.
customer_reviews.author: evolutionary backwards

customer_reviews.title: Rip off.
customer_reviews.text: Chunky and cheap. It is one week old and is as good as a $2 pillow. The first 2 days were great. Now Im folding and smacking it to fill the area my head is on.
customer_reviews.author: WhiteLionMycoh

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the worst pillow I’ve used honestly. Super lumpy, not at all confirming as they say. I used it for a total of three nights and by this morning had to go back to my old pillows. I have such pain in my left side of my neck and shoulder. I can tell my husband didn’t like it either because halfway through the night he gave up and just used the mattress, no pillow, to sleep. I hate that I even brought these into our home
customer_reviews.author: Corina

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: Worse pillow I have ever owned for $68.00 it should have sang me to sleep plus $10.00 to send it back. Will never try one of these pillows again. Don't waste your money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Crosier

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. LUMPY
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for about 2 months but despite fluffing in dryer and Washing, it is lumpy and I wake up all night with neck killing me!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Nicley

customer_reviews.title: all day to get an hour of cool at night paying 60$ for basically a burlap sac ...
customer_reviews.text: The pillow has the lumpyness I was looking for . However the casing is rough and almost unbearable. it has zero cooling ability I had to let it sit under the a.c. all day to get an hour of cool at night paying 60$ for basically a burlap sac filled with chew up memory foam. I recommend staying away from the brand entirely their claims are exaggerated. It was such a terrible waste of money it prompted my first ever product review and I've purchased at least 90 product in the last 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: PoS
customer_reviews.text: after about 6 mo. it would not hold it's shape, I wash and dry it on a regular basis as told. It is out of Amzon warranty so went to My Pillow to see about there 10 year warranty and was told to wash and dry and that it would come back to life, I did that and still wont make it though one night without going flat. SO much for their warranty. Don't wast your money on this pillow it wont last and they wont stand behind their warranty, piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Hype hype hype, dont believe the hype!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe that I fell for it. $64 for a pillow that I could have purchased the same quality for,, at much less. First of all the thing arrived so compressed that it took a day to halfway fill out. On the 2nd day I came to learn that what I thought was "halfway" was ACTUALLY full fluff. What an over priced waste of time REALLY! My pillow you call it? Well keep calling it that, because your getting it back!
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. The pillow is no different than a $7.99 one purchased at Target. It's on its way back.
customer_reviews.author: Katems

customer_reviews.title: Non-pillow pillow
customer_reviews.text: Not much I really want to say about this "pillow" It's really hard to imagine how anyone can get away with calling it one. Putting this thing under my head and I lay flat on the mattress. There is no support whatsoever. I have a 6 year old Serta pillow that still provides better support that this.
customer_reviews.author: LesT

customer_reviews.title: WORST WASTE OF MONEY I've ever spent
customer_reviews.text: WORST WASTE OF MONEY I've ever spent. Pillow goes flat in middle and bulges on either end, feels like I'm being suffocated. I have to turn it over 3 -4 times a night. YES it makes me hot. I have no neck support, still snore and wake with headaches from restless night sleep. I bought two for my husband and I. He threw his across the room and hasn't touched it since. He absolutely hated it after trying it for 5 nights, he told me he had to get some sleep. He can't be sleepy in his profession. JUST DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bandit's girl

customer_reviews.title: Great expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this pillow. It is no better than an inexpensive one. It flattens out as soon as you put your head on it. I expected it to keep its shape and firmness. It does not.
customer_reviews.author: elaine stumer

customer_reviews.title: Got mine yesterday. Very underwhelmed. Much hype over ...
customer_reviews.text: Got mine yesterday. Very underwhelmed. Much hype over something that appears cheap and unconstructed. Not worth the money. Buy elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Boudika

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was almost 70$ and the recipient does not like it or use it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Evil

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow!  But make sure you get the size recommended for you
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! I had to wash it one night so I had ro use a different pillow and I couldn't sleep! My husband has the one that's a bit firmer and he likes his too. I will say though. You really need to follow the recommended size, because I tried my husbands and its too big for me. It really makes a difference! I love that its washable. Downside is it takes forever to dry in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: jessie B

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the hype!
customer_reviews.text: I hate that I paid $50 for this pillow. I have used it for a few weeks now and I am completely disappointed. There is no difference between this pillow and the ones Walmart sells for $20 made by Serta or Sealy. I completely bought into the hype.....and I was snowed! I expected this pillow to be all that it was advertised as, that maybe my sleep would be a little better. I tried it as a side sleeper and as a back sleeper...no difference. This is no more than a plain everyday pillow that can be bought at any store offering bedding. Save yourself the $30 and buy a very nice pillow somewhere else! I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Finally, found both a pillow and mattress my husband likes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. I call him the original “Princess and the Pea.” Tried SO many different pillows and mattresses (waterbed, toppers, gel, memory foam, etc.). So expensive trying to get him comfortable. FINALLY, got him a Personal Comfort sleep-number style matress on Amazon and he stopped complaining, except for his pillow. After spending a ton on pillows - down, curved, shaped, foam, firm, soft, etc., I finally splurged and bought this one. And he loves it! Finally. Now we can both get some sleep.
customer_reviews.author: J. OConnor

customer_reviews.title: ... this pillow a few months ago I was very disappointed in the quality of this item
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this pillow a few months ago I was very disappointed in the quality of this item. There certainly is not enough filling to do what Mike says it will do. The minute my head hits this pillow my head hits the mattress with no support whatsoever . I kept it thinking I would feel better but with no satisfaction. I think if it had a little more filling In it , my neck would have more support . Oh well a lesson learned! Thanks for listening. EG Massachusetts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... fix for my neck and I bought two just waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I really really thought that was my fix for my neck and I bought two just waste of money . I wake up so sore from this pillows
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sad to say
customer_reviews.text: sad to say...I feel I got took.!! Cut pieces inside is lumpy!! The misleading ads (lots & lots) have got me. Sorry. Do not buy this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J. Oetter

customer_reviews.title: Not my perfect pillow
customer_reviews.text: very lumpy and nothing like I expected . flattens very easily each night.
customer_reviews.author: Camryn

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst pillow we ever slept on
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst pillow we ever slept on! It gives me a headache and a stiff neck! My husband who I bought it for hates it! I'm returning it! Any $20 Costco pillows are better that this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte K.

customer_reviews.title: The tv ad is true - one of the best pillows out there!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw these "My Pillow" tv commercials for a long time before I finally got one. I was skeptical of the claims. Turns out, they are true!!! I simply LOVE this pillow!!!! I made the mistake of buying my first one directly from the company, and paid significantly more. I had to get a couple extras, so got them from amazon. These pillows are fantastic!!! Supremely comfortable, and don't lose their fill. I have a couple of expensive Tempurpedic pillows, and I like the My Pillow better! Plus a bonus, these are made in the USA!!! Nice to support a U.S. company that produces a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorman777Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it goes flat in the middle of the night and I wake up with neck pains.
customer_reviews.author: john d ruark

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product SCAM
customer_reviews.text: Awful pillow. This guy is scamming everyone in America. My wife and i have had back and neck pain ever since we tried this garbage. The fill inside is terrible and as you lay on it the fill is unevenly displaced all over leaving zero support. I would rather leave 0 stars. If i had to choose sleeping on razor blades or this pillow again I'd definitely choose razor blades.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Z.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Could have bought a 8.00 pillow from the dollar store that would be just as bad. Little foam pieces inside pillow side around and do not hold as shape, have to constantly reposition it.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Bum

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this pillow would work well but it gave me a headache; I bought a bamboo filled pillow off of Amazon a couple of years ago and am much happier with that one. In fact the minute I switched things felt much better. I do not recommend "Mypillow".
customer_reviews.author: ted m kinney

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Worst Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I was scammed. While I like the dude in the commercials because he is a Christian, this is the absolute worst pillow I have ever owned. It is a total joke. It's not firm at all. It feels like it is incomplete because there are massive "gaps" in the inner filling that make it so useless it's laughable. Sorry, my brother, but your pillow totally sucks. It's lumpy and I would rather use a book for a pillow than this piece of junk. God bless.
customer_reviews.author: SSY

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: These pillows fall apart in the wash. And customer service is HORRIBLE. I am so disappointed in these. They are grainy to sleep on and fell apart on the first washing. When I called customer service, they wanted a picture of the pieces. I had to get a neighbor to come do it for me. After sending it, they wanted a picture of the pillow (already in garbage). Wanted me to go get the neighbor again....I finally gave up. When I went to Bed, Bath and Beyond to get new pillows there were two other people in there with the same experience. We all bought them direct from the manufacturer. Never, never recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lois M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth 10 bucks.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I’m baffled. Supposedly this pillow is firm. Not the case at all. It’s so sparsely filled that when I lay my head on it, it touches the mattress underneath. This pillow is far inferior to the 10 dollar ones I got at target. I feel like I was swindled. I had older pillows from this company that I absolutely loved for years. So when we upgraded to a king bed, I wanted new pillows that would fit the bed better. I’m so beyond disappointed. Such a tremendous waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: candicelynn86

customer_reviews.title: Not Anything Like What I Expected.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate hate hate this pillow. It's in the closet and more than likely will be in the trash soon. It is just a bundle of cotton? just bunched up. I don't know if I got some kind of defective one or if this is just a con. It is definitely not something I would ever ever order again. It took FOREVER for me to receive it and then it is just awful.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Over-hyped disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: After the first night I used this pillow, I had pain in my neck, shoulder, and jaw. I slept poorly because the pillow filling kept shifting so I had no support under my head. Major disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra P.

customer_reviews.title: Not A Recommended Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Thought this pillow was gonna be great and I was excited to use it. After 3 weeks the pillow is already breaking apart. I would not recommend this pillow as it is not worth the money. I will not recommend this nor purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany H

customer_reviews.title: The reviews are true I can get a better pillow at walmart for $5
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL DON'T BUY IT! it is trash! The reviews are true I can get a better pillow at walmart for $5. Flat, uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: could just as well bought a good pillow at walmart and saved 40
customer_reviews.text: was no where near the hype. could just as well bought a good pillow at walmart and saved 40 dollars
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J.

customer_reviews.title: Find another pillow
customer_reviews.text: Worst pillow I have owned. The patented locking foam is a con. The pillow has no substance. From a value perspective there was none. Would not even want to give it away.
customer_reviews.author: David Wishon

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST PILLOW I've EVER HAD
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST PILLOW I've EVER HAD! I'm hard to pleae and have neck problems. This pillow is the SOLUTION for me. Doesn't get flat like other pillows. I Highly Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: These are a waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these pillows just over a year ago for myself and also one for my husband. For the last six months, I have had to wash them or at least throw them in the dryer to get them to “fluff” back up, weekly. After one night of using, they are flat and feel like the foam in them has crumbled up. We have both woken up with horrible neck pain that lasted several days since we switched to these pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Pettes

customer_reviews.title: My Pillow should be called sweet dreams!
customer_reviews.text: Having struggled with asthma, back pain and insomnia for most of my adullt life, I ordered My Pillow on a whim. I am so happy I did! I fall asleep faster, stay asleep longer and I'll have to buy a few more for friends who punch pillows all night long like I've had to do. I have feather pillows, memory foam, gel pillows and all in various sizes, but My Pillow is the top of the heap. Thank you to the inventor of this and his company!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend. This pillow is just like any pillow you ...
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. This pillow is just like any pillow you could buy in the stores. I stopped using it because I got neck pain from it. It's an overpriced gimmick.
customer_reviews.author: Pat & Cindy

customer_reviews.title: It's not hype, this pillow is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am slowly going to be switching all of the pillows in our house to MyPillows. I was so skeptical when these came out, but honestly, the ease of cleaning them alone sold me. Then when I started waking up without neck pain, I realized I've found my pillow. Apparently, everyone in the house thought the same thing. We now have two MyPillows and they seem to grow legs and walk to any particularly bedroom in the house because all family members really find them comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lindenheart

customer_reviews.title: Love love love my pillow !
customer_reviews.text: I waited a long time before buying a 49.00 bed pilllow.... wish I had just done it years ago! By far my absolutely favorite pillow ever. I'm a side sleeper it stays right where I want it without having to adjust it over and over 5stars all the way... now I have to buy the rest of the family one !!! Use the size chart to get the perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: BREATH2

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Wish I’d read the reviews before I bought this terrible pillow. It’s basically no better than just pouring a bunch of cotton balls into a pillow case. It might actually be worse than that. I got the “medium” fill pillow and even after trying to fluff it up, it is as though there isn’t even a pillow under my head because it is so thin. Such a sincere waste of materials.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Y

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not a comfortable pillow... would not recommend - Cheap materials
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rip-Off Pillow
customer_reviews.text: How marketing can make you millions. By ripping off millions of customers !! This pillow is so horrendous that it made me desire one from the trash can that someone had thrown out because it looked so much more comfortable than My Pillow. This is the biggest rip-off on the market. It is cheap, tattered and not comfortable in the least. This is my biggest warning yet on Amazon to customers NOT to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get it, it’s just supper  UNCOMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: Super uncomfortable, made me go to chiropractor and spend 100 more then the cost of this pillow. The pillow is breaking so easelly.
customer_reviews.author: Juval

customer_reviews.title: THIS PILLOW IS CRAP!! Totally overpriced, will not meet expectations! You're better off buying a $3 pillow at Ikea. NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PILLOW!!! Literally was half empty. The amount of filling in the pillow was less than what you find in a throw pillow. The description say two pillows and we only received one. If I had to guess, the people writing positive reviews and rating five stars are probably being paid to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth G.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The adds made this pillow sound great but that is all advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DONT waste your $
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is RIDICULOUS. It’s nothing but lumpy shredded foam. It’s a complete waste of money. Dont bother.
customer_reviews.author: Paige C.

customer_reviews.title: Frumpy
customer_reviews.text: This is the second "super pillow" I've tried from Amazon. Both have been lackluster, but this one was really bad. It had the consistency of a beanbag chair, and was useless to me as a pillow. Looks like I'm not the only one who thinks so, wish I read reviews before purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Cale Tagawa

customer_reviews.title: Extremely let down
customer_reviews.text: I have degenerative disc and I was so excited to get this pillow. I havrdjy ever give bad reviews. I can’t even return it since I have been sick. I’m so sorry. I really wanted to enjoy this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: $50 for that pillow is way too much. Its not worth $5. its basically ripped up memory foam inside and very flimsy, returned before it even got used.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowkissed

customer_reviews.title: The My Pillows are misrepresented
customer_reviews.text: The tv add got me Don’t let it get you For the amount of money I spent on 2 pillows they should’ve been much better quality The pillows were way to firm uncomfortably so and nearly impossible to position to my liking I would never recommend these pillows to anyone
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: I can feel every little chunk of whatever it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I can feel every little chunk of whatever it is filled with. My wife hates hers too. My medical doctor tried one and she hates it too. On the other hand, one guy at work loves his. Seems to be no middle ground.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as advertised to be
customer_reviews.text: Bought yellow and green color firmness in king size. Was hoping for it to be as good as they advertise, but was disappointing. Fill shifts, so when wake up at night-no support under neck at all. Constantly have to flip pillow to get some neck support. The firmer type is too firm to sleep on-get a neck ache. Not sure if king size pillows are longer and have more room for filling to shift has anything to do with it? Wish could return both as too much money for miss-promise.
customer_reviews.author: amazonreview

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: I got the medium. I can’t keep my head on it! Its too high! How do I send it back? It came with the air sucked out and in a plastic bag. You are told to put in dryer for 15 min - and it puffs up! It’s useless!
customer_reviews.author: Karen U

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised. Just a lot of hype!
customer_reviews.text: Pillow not what I expected. The video and presentation is just a lot of hype. Wasn't comfortable at all and my wife woke up with neck pains. Returned it right away. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: V-ROD

customer_reviews.title: Don't fall for this scam
customer_reviews.text: Just a gimmick. I've had better pillows I bought in Walmart for $5. This one is just shredded foam, absolutely nothing revolutionary about it. I can even smell that plastic synthetic stuff while I slept on it. I got the medium firmness and it compressed down so much, it was like I was sleeping on a stack of newspapers.
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: Gives me headaches
customer_reviews.text: I tried the regular and firm queen pillows and both of them caused me to wake up with headaches/neck aches. Also, the pillow fill gets bunched together, causing a part of the pillow (usually under my head) to have no fill. So it is like I am sleeping with no pillow at all. Did not work for me, so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: First, I ordered the Buy 2 special, but only received 1. Then, we opened it and it was all lumpy, we tried sticking it in the dryer per the instructions to fluff it up, thinking that was the solution. It fluffed up but it is not supporting the neck AT ALL; it's still all lumpy and cheap/
customer_reviews.author: Diana Olson

customer_reviews.title: Not the adaptable thing I was promised. I sleep ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the adaptable thing I was promised. I sleep on my side and it very much did not conform to my neck/head. Manufacturer advertised 60-day return but Amazon shortened that to 30, so I missed the deadline.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: My pillow Classic series bed pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow did not hold its shape after TWO WEEKS. Very little support.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Pillow too hard
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed. It seems to be too hard, and I don't know if time will make it softer.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores A. Hoynes

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this years ago and I still enjoy it. Spent $400 in pillows that failed to stop my headaches and neck pain prior to buying this one. THIS ONE BEAT THEM ALL. Don't be put-off by the "as seen on TV" label. Stop torchering yourself. Just be sure to put it in the dryer before the first use. The "new" smell does go away. It does take a few days to break in, be patient.
customer_reviews.author: Epidage

customer_reviews.title: Good marketing, poor product
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is uncomfortable and feels like a bunch of chunks of cheap foam were used to fill pillow. I love the fact the pillows are made in the USA, but product is poorly made. The pillow actually made my neck pain worse and gave me headaches every night I utilized. Don’t waste your money on this product. Pillow has sold well because of solid marketing, but the product doesn’t meet their marketing guarantees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total Crap
customer_reviews.text: Came vacuum sealed like a bedroll. Pure lumps. As the tag suggested, I put it on high in the dryer for 10 minutes. It became larger, puffier lumps. I thought it was weird, but had never had a My Pillow so I wasn't sure what to expect. I just came for Kohl's, and felt a REAL My pillow. This is definitely a knock off. Didn't sleep any better than usual, and definitely not worth $42
customer_reviews.author: Sheena's Mom

customer_reviews.title: I've slept on better hotel pillows....
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy one after my mom swore her my pillow got rid of her back pain and she'd never slept better. Gave it a shot and I've woke up with a sore neck every morning, which never happened with my tempurpedic pillow. Maybe if you just believe in as seen on tv products and everything they tell you, it'll work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: oh so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was so tired of buying pillows and a year later they were flat, hard and only about 2 inches thick. Not to mention extremely uncomfortable. These are the best, most comfortable pills I have ever owned. Just great as far as I am concerned. I have had them over a month but haven't tried to clean them as yet so can't comment on the cleaning. Would highly recommend. A little pricy, but worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Dor

customer_reviews.title: Not as fluffy, full as other MyPillows
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased quite a few queen sized MyPillows through the years for ourselves and other family members. They are always supportive and full. They are holding strong after many years. Finally, I bought my husband the king size to actually fit our bed. He used it for a few days and it was so flat. I washed it, dried it and had him try again. This particular size doesn't seem to stay as full as the queen. I use it now because he likes more full-ness to his pillows.
customer_reviews.author: giosmom

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly Sleep
customer_reviews.text: I (and my neck) LOVE THIS pillow! This is my second My Pillow. My first, which is still in use after six years, went to my hubby. He didn't think he would like it, but WOW, he fell in love the FIRST night. (and he doesn't even have neck issues. This is honestly the ONLY pillow I WILL sleep on and the only one I CAN sleep on. The only small challenge is the drying it after it's washed. But it's totally OK when I am back with my pillow again!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. It loses shape and does not stay cool. A waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Almcnorris

customer_reviews.title: This pillow didn't seem like much when I got it
customer_reviews.text: This pillow didn't seem like much when I got it, kind of lumpy in fact. But I have to say, it is really comfortable. But it does get warm sometimes and I have to flip it. Still, it's a great product. I've been using it over a year now and it's still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get used to it.
customer_reviews.text: Got a small for my wife. After several days she gave up on hoping it would help her. It needed to be 're-fluffed' before every use as her head indention would stay in the pillow. I gave it a try for a couple of nights and went back to my old one. I guess all the 'hype' had our hopes built up too high.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Womack

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is not worth the money. I have already had to put it in the dryer twice to get it back to a sleepable shape, and I haven't had it long. It isn't any better than a regular pillow that you can get straight off the shelf at a department store.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: my pillow
customer_reviews.text: i was very unhappy with this product!!It was flatter and more uncomfortable than my wal mart pillows and woke up 2 days in a row with a horrible headache and neck ache.Needlees to say i sent it back!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kipfer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The very worse pillow ever. If the box had not been destroyed I would have returned it
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable pillow
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pillow. Best pillow ever!!!! For the past year I have tried all kinds of pillows as I kept waking up with headaches. After the first night with this pillow I had no headaches and have not had any ever since. When I lay my head down on it I immediatelly feel comfortable and can fall asleep right away. If you've had problems sleeping I highly recommend this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Angel with me

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the right pillow for a good night’s rest for years. Switched from feather pillows because they go flat and have not been satisfied with any other pillow until this week. Purchased a king size, firm and love it. Have ordered a second one already and plan to swap out every pillow in the house as time and money allow. Just the right amount of support and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Good, not GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Nice, long lasting, durable pillow. However, I feel like my pillows are not all they’re cracked up to be. It came rolled up, all you have to do is put it in the dryer for a couple minutes and it’s back to it’s normal shape. It does hold nice support if you need it but never improved my sleep quality. I am interested to see how the mattress topper would do though!
customer_reviews.author: Cadie Coderre

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't sleep on it as it is too thick but it is a good pillow to go under my knees or in between ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't get the hype. I couldn't sleep on it as it is too thick but it is a good pillow to go under my knees or in between my knees while laying on my side. Don't ever pay full price for one of these, instead, try to find a two for one deal. It's made in the U.S., which I like.
customer_reviews.author: DDWitt

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous pillow.
customer_reviews.text: It seriously HURT my neck. Filling is too uneven and doesn't compress to meet your need. I sent it back for a refund under the 60 day return policy; but I had to pay the shipping. Now I have doctor bills and chiropractic care. Don't buy it !!!
customer_reviews.author: mari

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had neck and shoulder pain for years on top of Insomnia and have spent thousands of dollars on pillows including those high end pillows from Brookstone and Sharper Image. None have helped. A week on My Pillow and my pain went away. The soft/medium is way too soft for me. The firm works perfect. The tighter the pillowcase the more firm it is and the longer it retains the lift. I sleep on my side and it's the only pillow I've ever had that holds my head up enough that my shoulders don't feel like they are being driven up into my neck. I have bought multiple for myself and as gifts to family members with neck issues.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wainscott

customer_reviews.title: Heaven to bitsies!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical when I ordered this pillow I just couldn’t see paying the price, my husband wanted it badly and thought it has to be good, he just knows it well I ordered it and I ordered me a stomach sleeper pillow. Mine was cheaper lol, anyways they came in and let’s say he lost his my pillow it’s my pillow now! I love it I love it. It’s comfortable it’s just grooves to u in the right places no more pillow sliding out from under my head stomach sleeper back sleeper watching tv sleeper it’s a good dam pillow. Worth the money will be purchasing more. If ur conflicted do it u won’t be sorry! Love love
customer_reviews.author: kimberly moree

customer_reviews.title: This pillow was just like any other pillow I ha e ever used
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was just like any other pillow I have ever used. It was just much more expensive. My dogs like it and use it as one of their beds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "I love my pillow
customer_reviews.text: I was almost hoping that the pillow would be just another hyped product... I mean, who says, "I love my pillow!" Well, now, I do! Love it! Very restful and I am sleeping longer with fewer instances of waking and restlessness.
customer_reviews.author: Les Farthing

customer_reviews.title: NOT as Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Beware.. Not as expected.. didn't hold shape. Spend more time trying to keep fluffed. NOT Comfortable after a while. .Neck sore. We Went back to our Tempurpedic pillow - MY Husband uses his as a resting pillow under his arm. Expensive Pillow for arm resting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: This pillow lasted me two months before completely losing its form and ability for the fill to regain its texture. I followed the manufacturer's instructions to the letter, and the inside of the pillow feels like it's full of balled-up socks. Customer care was about as useful as a white crayon. It is obviously not a coincidence that my money-back guarantee expired four days ago...don't waste your money on this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: This pillow replaced all 3, Correct fill is a must!
customer_reviews.text: I HATE NEW PILLOWS! I have an arrangement of three pillows that I have been using for years, which includes a breastfeeding pillow to support my neck when I sleep on my side. THIS pillow replaced all three! It is imperative that you go to my pillow's site and find out what fill you need. If not, it will vastly change the performance of the pillow. One last thing, I am guessing the "video reviews" of this pillow are and anti-campaign.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob S.

customer_reviews.title: Might as well have not been using a pillow.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. I have used a MyPillow for the last 5 years. In fact its the only brand of pillow I can sleep on. The pillow I got in the mail had not even close to enough filler. It was like not even using a pillow. Please. Tale the time to go to any mall or Kohls etc.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

product_meta.title: MyPillow Classic Pillow (Standard/Queen, White [Medium])
product_meta.description: Size:Standard/Queen| Color:White [Medium]MyPillow Classic Pillow is made with patented interlocking fill that gives you the exact support you need as an individual regardless of your sleep position. It is machine washable and dryable and comes with a 10-year warranty. Standard/Queen: 18.5” x 28” King: 18.5” x 34”
feature_bullets: Made with patented interlocking fill, Gives you the exact support you need as an individual
Made 100% in the USA - Manufactured in our home state of Minnesota!
MyPillow Promotions not offered on Amazon

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars17,859 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: MyPillow® Pillows and other products have a 10-year limited warranty on any workmanship and/or material defects. We warranty MyPillows not to go flat during the 10-year warranty period, regardless of how many times the pillow is washed & dried. MyPillow will replace the defective MyPillow with a pillow of equal or greater value. MyPillow will cover all shipping charges.
